text: Arthur Aston may refer to: * Sir Arthur Aston (governor) (died 1627), proprietary governor of Avalon * Sir Arthur Aston (army officer) (1590–1649), English soldier and Royalist * Sir Arthur Ingram Aston (1798–1836), English diplomat * Arthur Vincent Aston (1886–1981), colonial administrator in British Malaya
title: Arthur Aston
